# I have detected a nearby coal resource patch with its center at (17.75, -12.75). 
# Now, I will attempt to move closer to this coal patch to facilitate the placement of the Stone Furnace.

# Step 39: Move to the center position of the nearby coal patch
move_to(Position(x=17.75, y=-12.75))  # Move towards the identified coal patch center position.
